model_answer: The correct answer is D: [00:02:32 - 00:03:39]. In this segment of the video, the man sits at a desk with a globe and rocks while on-screen text from a 1949 Science paper by Arnold and Libby is shown. The narrator then mentions that carbon dating has worked since 1949 with blind tests confirming results.
The answer is A: [00:03:39 - 00:04:26]. The mention of animated maps of Antarctic ocean currents and a later C12/C14 graphic labeled "After 6000 years" appears from 00:03:39 to 00:04:26 in the audio.
